client_notes.get_all_notes: SELECT TOP (?) note_id, action_type, note_text, created_by, created_date, status FROM dbo.notes WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE client_id = ? ORDER BY created_date DESC
client_notes.get_recent_notes: SELECT TOP (?) note_id, note_text FROM dbo.notes WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE client_id = ? AND created_date >= DATEADD(day, -?, GETDATE())
